steps.name: Given User has request specifications ready for Sign
When User sends a post request to Sign In endpoint with credentials "demo2tester@email.org" and "@Demo123"
And User receives a token in response body
And User validates that the response received is of valid json format
And User receives details of account in response "Demo", "Tester" and "demo2tester@email.org"
